title: Abraham Tested
summary: Genesis 22 tells how God tests Abraham by asking him to sacrifice his son Isaac. Abraham obeys, but God intervenes and provides a ram instead. This event demonstrates Abraham’s faith and foreshadows God's future provision.

faq.question: Why did God ask Abraham to sacrifice Isaac?
faq.answer: To test Abraham’s faith and obedience to God.

faq.question: What did Abraham say when Isaac asked about the sacrifice?
faq.answer: He said, 'God will provide for Himself the lamb for a burnt offering.'
